name: Binary Ninja MCP
author: fosdick.io
description: A Binary Ninja plugin that provides a MCP (Model Context Protocol) server with HTTP endpoints for LLM integration.
longdescription:
# Binary Ninja MCP

This repository contains a Binary Ninja plugin, MCP server, and bridge that enables seamless integration of Binary Ninja's capabilities with LLM assistance. While primarily tested as a Claude Desktop integration, the bridge can be used with other interfaces.

## Features
- Seamless, real-time integration between Binary Ninja and Claude
- Enhanced reverse engineering workflow with AI assistance
- Primary support for Claude Desktop, but extensible for other integrations

![Generating a Binary Analysis Report](https://github.com/fosdickio/binary_ninja_mcp/raw/main/docs/mcp-demo-report.png)

![Renaming Functions](https://github.com/fosdickio/binary_ninja_mcp/raw/main/docs/mcp-demo-rename.gif)

Visit https://github.com/fosdickio/binary_ninja_mcp for usage instructions and more information.
